mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.merchant_code AS "merchantCode", a.status AS "status", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.check_by AS "checkBy", a.check_date AS "checkDate", m.nickname AS "merchantName", u.mobile AS "mobile", m.status AS "merchantStatus", m.register_way AS "registerWay", u.user_type AS "memberType", m.merchant_type AS "merchantType"
left join member_info m on m.id = a.merchant_code left join sys_user u on u.id = a.merchant_code
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM member_merchant_check a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_merchant_check( id, merchant_code, status, remarks, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, check_by, check_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{merchantCode}, #{status}, #{remarks}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{checkBy}, #{checkDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member_merchant_check SET merchant_code = #{merchantCode}, status = #{status}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, check_by = #{checkBy}, check_date = #{checkDate} WHERE id = #{id}
